author: zach-folwick
body:
Just to get infrastructure in place.  None of this code will get called by PSL yet.  We are not at that point yet.  Further tests are coming.

@paulcallen

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Definitely don't merge. We'll want to split your changes out in a bit. When #545 is done, your tests should just go in `test/csharp`, and your work to MMIN can be looked at separately.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @zach-folwick Do you want to keep this PR open?

comments.author: zach-folwick
comments.body: No-  I'm closing it and applying your suggestions to the actual work tree, reopening with a newer PR for actual merging.  Will likely require your assistance.

title: Dev/mmi xunit
